title: Gear O'Clock: Digital Sense
summary: DIGITAL SENSE Watch Face for Android Wear!
developerAddress: 1700 Sofia, Prof. Georgi Bradistilov 6, fl. 4, Belvek Ltd.
description: Features:★ Time and date display★ GMT time display★ Battery indicator ★ New notifications count indicator ★ Weather information ★ Digital and analog clocks ★ Day and Night modes ★ 10 different backgrounds for Day mode ★ 2 different colors for Night Mode ★ Always On clock ★ Charging clock (Screen is on and displays digital clock while charging)Installation:How to:Compatible with:•	Moto 360 ( moto360 )•	Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )•	Huawei Watch•	LG G Watch R ( lgwr )•	LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )•	LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )•	Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )•	Samsung Gear Live•	Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )Make sure your watch has the Android Wear System 5.0 or higher version
descriptionHTML:
Features:

★ Time and date display
★ GMT time display
★ Battery indicator
★ New notifications count indicator
★ Weather information
★ Digital and analog clocks
★ Day and Night modes
★ 10 different backgrounds for Day mode
★ 2 different colors for Night Mode
★ Always On clock
★ Charging clock (Screen is on and displays digital clock while charging)


Installation:

How to:


Compatible with:
• Moto 360 ( moto360 )
• Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
• Huawei Watch
• LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
• LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
• LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
• Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
• Samsung Gear Live
• Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )


Make sure your watch has the Android Wear System 5.0 or higher version
comments: Looks nothing like image above!  Looks crystal clear in image but very cloudy in reality.  Very disappointed.
Bring it back to Gear! You stole my money ($2) by removing this app from the Samsung store! Do not support this developer
Unable to adjust any settings after pairing. Cannot change times colours etc.....
Weather not correct or updating small hr display 12 hrs out clock shows 10am display 10pm
Weather does not work Installed with a bit of syncing issues and does not update the weather. Says "no data"
almost good it's nice and all, but weather is not updating. and just now read some reviews, it's not fixed for months.
